speaker: witch1
dialog: When shall we three meet again?

speaker: witch1
dialog: In thunder, lightning, or in rain?

speaker: witch2
dialog: When the hurlyburly's done, When the battle's lost and won.

speaker: witch2
dialog: When the battle's lost and won.

speaker: witch3
dialog: That will be ere the set of sun.

speaker: all
dialog: Fair is foul, and foul is fair

speaker: all
dialog: Hover through the fog and filthy air.
